sourcesContent:
export const recipes = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: 'Methi Paratha',
    region: 'North India',
    state: 'Punjab',
    calories: 280,
    time: '20 min',
    protein: 8,
    carbs: 35,
    fat: 12,
    image: 'ü´ì',
    difficulty: 'Easy',
    ingredients: ['Wheat flour', 'Fenugreek leaves', 'Oil', 'Salt', 'Spices'],
    instructions: [
      'Mix wheat flour with chopped fenugreek leaves',
      'Add spices and knead into dough',
      'Roll into flatbreads',
      'Cook on hot griddle with oil'
    ],
    category: 'Breakfast',
    tags: ['Vegetarian', 'High Fiber', 'Traditional']
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Ragi Dosa',
    region: 'South India',
    state: 'Karnataka',
    calories: 150,
    time: '15 min',
    protein: 6,
    carbs: 28,
    fat: 3,
    image: 'ü•û',
    difficulty: 'Medium',
    ingredients: ['Ragi flour', 'Rice flour', 'Onions', 'Green chillies', 'Curry leaves'],
    instructions: [
      'Mix ragi and rice flour with water',
      'Add chopped onions and spices',
      'Spread thin on hot griddle',
      'Cook until crispy'
    ],
    category: 'Breakfast',
    tags: ['Vegan', 'Gluten-Free', 'High Calcium']
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: 'Moong Dal Khichdi',
    region: 'West India',
    state: 'Gujarat',
    calories: 220,
    time: '25 min',
    protein: 12,
    carbs: 38,
    fat: 4,
    image: 'üç≤',
    difficulty: 'Easy',
    ingredients: ['Moong dal', 'Rice', 'Turmeric', 'Cumin', 'Ghee'],
    instructions: [
      'Wash rice and dal together',
      'Pressure cook with turmeric',
      'Temper with cumin and ghee',
      'Serve hot with pickle'
    ],
    category: 'Lunch',
    tags: ['Vegetarian', 'Easy to Digest', 'Protein Rich']
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: 'Palak Paneer',
    region: 'North India',
    state: 'Punjab',
    calories: 310,
    time: '30 min',
    protein: 15,
    carbs: 12,
    fat: 22,
    image: 'ü•ó',
    difficulty: 'Medium',
    ingredients: ['Spinach', 'Paneer', 'Onions', 'Tomatoes', 'Cream', 'Spices'],
    instructions: [
      'Blanch and puree spinach',
      'Saut√© onions and tomatoes',
      'Add spinach puree and spices',
      'Add paneer cubes and cream'
    ],
    category: 'Dinner',
    tags: ['Vegetarian', 'High Protein', 'Iron Rich']
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: 'Idli Sambar',
    region: 'South India',
    state: 'Tamil Nadu',
    calories: 180,
    time: '35 min',
    protein: 7,
    carbs: 32,
    fat: 2,
    image: '‚ö™',
    difficulty: 'Medium',
    ingredients: ['Rice', 'Urad dal', 'Toor dal', 'Vegetables', 'Tamarind', 'Sambar powder'],
    instructions: [
      'Soak and grind rice and urad dal',
      'Ferment overnight',
      'Steam in idli molds',
      'Prepare sambar separately'
    ],
    category: 'Breakfast',
    tags: ['Vegetarian', 'Fermented', 'Low Fat']
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: 'Dhokla',
    region: 'West India',
    state: 'Gujarat',
    calories: 160,
    time: '25 min',
    protein: 5,
    carbs: 30,
    fat: 3,
    image: 'üü®',
    difficulty: 'Medium',
    ingredients: ['Besan', 'Eno', 'Turmeric', 'Mustard seeds', 'Curry leaves'],
    instructions: [
      'Mix besan with water and spices',
      'Add eno and steam',
      'Temper with mustard and curry leaves',
      'Cut into pieces and serve'
    ],
    category: 'Snacks',
    tags: ['Vegetarian', 'Steamed', 'Low Calorie']
  }
];
